name: Televisheni
tag_list: video, broadcas, tv, channel, streaming, social, media
overview:
Cable TV; been there, done that. Ready for the next big thing? Reach new customers in ways you’ve only dreamed of. First there was black and white, then there was color, next came Beta and VHS, followed by laser disc and dvd. HD DVD almost had its way, but Blu-ray won the day… and now its time for cable free InternetTV.

Televisheni allows video content owners to reuse existing video content in an emerging medium; InternetTV. With Televisheni you can easily create a consistent and compelling app that works across all major InternetTV/Smart TV & mobile platforms. Content owners can expand their audience, be a step ahead of the competition, and expand revenue potential with minimal cost and time to market. Absolutely no programming required.
